description.en:
One day a boy named Pete finds a map of "Treasure Island" that his deceased father left behind. He starts on a voyage to find it together with "Captain," who was a friend of his father. But his ship is attacked by pirates, led by Bowarl, and the two are caught. When a storm hits the pirate ship, the two are thrown into the sea and washed up on the shore of a solitary island in the southern ocean. To their surprise, this island is the one they have been looking for…  
  
The manga that made Tezuka famous. It is an action-adventure drama inspired by Robert Louis Stevenson's book.

This is the redone version for the Tezuka 400 Complete Works.

When time came to collect NTI for the Complete Works, Tezuka had promised that *All* of his works would get collected, but the original version was presumed lost. 

Tezuka, wishing to keep on his promise, decided to redraw the entire manga from memory. The version restored characters previously cut (like Peter Pan). The original ending was also restored, making this the definitive version of *New Treasure Island*.

Among other alterations, this 1984 version is a 4Koma manga whereas the original was a mix of 2/3Koma.


---
**Volume 281 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
description.fr:
(amazon.fr)

Un jour, un garçon nommé Pete trouve une carte de l'île aux trésors que son défunt père lui a léguée. Il se lance dans l'aventure, accompagné du Capitaine, un ami de son père. Leur bateau est alors attaqué par des pirates... et les voici prisonniers. Mais une tempête éclate et nos deux héros se retrouvent à dériver en mer sur un radeau de fortune. Ils atteignent tant bien que mal une île perdue dans l'océan... Adaptation très libre de L'île au trésor de Stevenson, c'est aussi le premier manga d'Osamu Tezuka sorti en relié en 1947.
description.ko:
만화의 신 테즈카 오사무가 이룬 첫 번째 업적 ‘신보물섬’!
흥미진진한 원초적 모험 끝에 소년을 기다리고 있던 것은?!

꿈 많은 소년 피트는 보물섬의 지도를 갖고 모험의 바다로 떠난다.
바다에서, 그리고 또 다른 육지에서 선장, 해적, 토인들을 연달아 만나며 모험은 점차 커져 가는데…… 그 끝에는 과연 어떤 보물이?!

일본 만화의 새로운 시대를 연 만화의 신의 초기 인기작!
60년이 넘는 세월을 거쳐 오늘날 새롭게 다시 태어난다!!
description.pt-br: Um dia um garoto chamado Pete encontra um mapa de uma “Ilha do Tesouro” e decide procurá-lo. Ele começa sua viagem com o “Capitão”, que foi amigo de seu pai, e um cão que ele acabara de salvar, mas o navio é atacado por piratas comandados pelo temível Bowarl.

biography.en:
Osamu Tezuka (手塚 治虫, b. 手塚 治, Tezuka Osamu; 3 November 1928 – 9 February 1989) was a Japanese manga artist, cartoonist, and animator. Born in Osaka Prefecture, his prolific output, pioneering techniques, and innovative redefinitions of genres earned him such titles as "the Father of Manga" (マンガの父, Manga no Chichi), "the Godfather of Manga" (マンガの教父, Manga no Kyōfu) and "the God of Manga" (マンガの神様, Manga no Kami-sama). 

Tezuka began what was known as the manga revolution in Japan with his [New Treasure Island](https://mangadex.org/title/63487511-434d-4a98-a1da-13bf80e9fcb8/new-treasure-island-1947) published in 1947. His output would spawn some of the most influential, successful, and well-received manga series including the children mangas [Astro Boy](https://mangadex.org/title/ca4c84bb-7272-45aa-a22d-dc1282b52372/tetsuwan-atom), [Princess Knight](https://mangadex.org/title/eb1b4f6f-8bc2-40a5-9398-768f5d4aea01/princess-knight-1953) and [Kimba the White Lion](https://mangadex.org/title/bad33763-70c6-40b7-8d14-190556fc55f0/jungle-emperor), and the adult-oriented series [Black Jack](https://mangadex.org/title/fd86eab2-f0f3-47d3-bce5-5628e97f37dc/black-jack), [Phoenix](https://mangadex.org/title/cc647d62-3a2c-474b-ac4e-844256ab185d/hi-no-tori), and [Buddha](https://mangadex.org/title/4e102d46-0a98-4249-8a42-98e4705b663e/buddha), all of which won several awards.

Tezuka died of stomach cancer in 1989. His death had an immediate impact on the Japanese public and other cartoonists. A museum was constructed in Takarazuka dedicated to his memory and life works, and Tezuka received many posthumous awards.
